title: Basic Combat - Everyone knows how to fight
description: Every character can engage in basic combat using their training and available weapons.

outcomes.text: You strike true and deal damage as intended.

bullets: Your weapon is damaged or depleted

outcomes.text: You miss and the enemy retaliates:
bullets: Take damage from the enemy's response

title: Imperial Knowledge - Understanding the Imperium
description: Draw upon your knowledge of Imperial culture, hierarchy, and procedures to navigate social situations or identify threats.

outcomes.text: Your knowledge serves you well. You understand the situation completely.

bullets: The knowledge is incomplete or outdated
The information comes with unwanted implications
Your questions reveal ignorance to the wrong people
The situation is more complex than you realized

title: Universal Access - Available to all characters
description: This represents moves and abilities that every character in the Rogue Trader setting would have access to, regardless of their specific role.

outcomes.text: This move is always available to demonstrate the Everyone role functionality.
